name: Ladybird
title: ladybird.org
shortDescription: Ladybird is a new, non-profit backed web browser and engine designed from scratch to prioritize web standards, performance, stability, and security. Initially an HTML viewer for SerenityOS, it now supports multiple platforms including Linux and macOS. Ideal for early adopters and developers, it's set for an Alpha release in 2026. Users can contribute via GitHub, join the community on Discord, and support through donations.
pros: Focused on web standards and security
No user monetization schemes like crypto tokens
cons: Still in early development, not yet released
No established user base or performance benchmarks
